TEXT.TITLE: EUROFIMA LAUNCHING 40 MLN SWISS FRANC NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Eurofima of Basle is launching 40 mln Swiss francs of six year notes with a 4-3/8 pct coupon and 100.25 issue price, lead manager Zurich Cantonal Bank said. Payment is due April 22. REUTER
